titles.title: Electing certain Members to standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing certain Members to standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects specified Members to the following House Committees: (1) the Budget, and (2) Transportation and Infrastructure.
